title: Senior Verification Engineer
description:
**About Us:**  

Dizayee Solutions AB is a leading consulting company specializing in automotive engineering solutions. We pride ourselves on delivering innovative and high-quality services to our clients. We are currently seeking a Senior Verification Engineer to join our team and contribute to cutting-edge automotive projects.
  
  

**Job Description:**  

As a Senior Verification Engineer, you will play a key role in the validation and verification of automotive systems.
  
  

**Your responsibilities will include:**  

Preparing and maintaining the test environment for verification activities (HIL, SIL, & Vehicles).
  
Performing verification based on the software release plan
  
Conducting verification activities in HILs, SIL, Boxcars or vehicles on test tracks.
  
Developing structured and efficient verification methods.
  
Managing requirements and documenting test results.
  
  

**Skills and Qualifications:**  

We are looking for a candidate with strong expertise in the following areas:
  
Validation and Verification processes
  
Debugging and problem-solving in complex systems
  
Basics of AUTOSAR architecture
  
Systemweaver, Elektra
  
DSA, OBD, INCA
  
CAN Protocol/Standards
  
**Vector tools:** CANOe and CANalyzer.
  
**Good to have:** Control Desk, Automation Desk, Python, C language, Vtest Studio, IPG, IBM QC, DLT Tool
  
Programming Languages for test automation and analysis.
  
  

**What We Offer:**  

An opportunity to work on advanced automotive projects.
  
A collaborative and innovative work environment.
  
Professional growth and development opportunities.
  
If you are passionate about automotive technology and have the expertise to drive excellence in verification and validation, we’d love to hear from you!
  
  

**How to Apply:**  

Send your resume and cover letter to info@dsab.eu with the subject line “Senior Verification Engineer Application.”
  
Join us at Dizayee Solutions AB and contribute to shaping the future of the automotive industry!

title: Release Engineer
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 5+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
**Rollbeskrivning:** Main scopeAs a Release Coordinator you will be part of the release team, engage in a variety of activities, all aiming to support the Release Leader and Release Manager executing on the software plan for the different program milestones. In this you will be driving and preparing the releases of Product System Core System (“CIS release”) to Factory and Customer (OTA) including CR/ÄO-handling. In addition, you will also drive the Technical Administration of the Product System Core System and be a part of securing the evolution towards SPA3 and beyond.Main tasks/activitiesHandling the product structure (Part Numbers, SW in ConfigHub, Change Orders in KDP, Documents in Team Center). This includes securing approval and understanding of those concerned and/or the receiver of the software release. Configuration management. i.e. what’s included in what release, coordinating the included node deliveries and in that, coach and guide them to evolve and adapt their structure and processes to fit the purpose of release. Collecting, creating and keeping track of necessary documentation to support the release quality criteria for the whole product system Core System.Coordinate the SW Deliverables such as SW Load modules and their dependenciesExecute on Product life cycle and release planning of Software and other Configuration Items.Branches handling covering primarily the release trackWhat you'll bringDriving the Release lifecycle involves activities such as scheduling the release, coordinating between teams and deployment of release. As being part of the team orchestrating the activities you need to have the skills required within project- and team management to make the communication and the coordination between different teams to go easy. We believe you have experience within release and configuration management addressing the challenges of preparing for future content, workout complex timing, request of multiple variants, demand of quality assurance, etc.As a person, you are known for your ability to drive results. You are an analytical, independent and structured team player. You have experience working with multiple stakeholders and can make significant progress even when faced with uncertainty. To be successful in this role, we believe you have: • Minimum 5 years of experience from working with release management or continuous integration.• Experience from working within automotive industry or other relevant industries• Good understanding of embedded software development• Driven as a character, i.e. able to take ownership and a team player• Excellent communication skills
  
  

Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: System Verification Engineer
description:
* Heroes do not grow on trees; they grow in Noor Engineering


Noor Engineering
  
Noor engineering aims to provide clients with highly professional technical consultants. Our consultants are experts in their fields. Employees at Noor Engineering are proud of their employer.
  
Noor Engineering was founded at the end of 2015 and has ten employees today.
  
  

**Vision:**  

Noor Engineering helps individuals and organizations to achieve success
  
  

**Strategy:**  

We target excellence in everything we do. We are brave to work creatively with innovative solutions. We work with instant improvements and prioritize learning. We don’t compete with low prices; we compete with maximizing added value.
  
Our Services
  
Our consultants have experience in world-class in the Automotive and Railway industries. We offer testing, Test management, Software development, Project Management, and Agile coaching consultants.
  
Today’s software development and testing environments are complex and challenging. Short delivery time scales, complex products to test, and demanding customers. These challenges require a well thought project management practices, development, and test way of working and intelligent test management practices.
  
People skills are among the most important critical success factors in any project. We offer solutions to strengthen people skills in testing, project management, SCRUM, and agile testing.We are now looking for a Verification Engineer for Charging & Traction Voltage System for our client within the automotive industry.
  
Responsibilities and tasks
  
You will be a consultant in a team out on the customer site. The electromobility system testing includes traction voltage system (involving analog measurements) and functional/software testing.
  
You are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders and customers at all levels.
  
Contribute to a culture of improvement and implement improvements to increase effectiveness and efficiency.
  
You are an ambassador for Noor Engineering and optimizing the added value for Noor Engineering and its clients.
  
  

**Requirements:**  

B.Sc. Electrical or Computer Engineering or similar.
  
Three years of experience working with electromobility, power electronics and verification and measurement techniques in functional verification and electromobility systems is a must, preferably within the automotive industry.
  
Experience of test automation and how to make testing efficient and effective
  
Experience of verification within traction voltage systems.
  
Familiar with Agile according to SAFe
  
A plus if you have experience with charging communication protocols.
  
Insights, analytics, and data management experience
  
Experience in complex global environments
  
ISTQB
  
  

**Personal Skills Required:**  

Skilled in Electromobility components and system knowledge with an emphasis on software functionality.
  
Test method development and ability to verify the results.
  
Skilled in electromobility system testing.
  
You are systematic and organized and work in a structured manner with a great ability to plan and execute on time.
  
Driven and can make decisions based on facts and engineering judgment.
  
Result-oriented and up to challenging the current normal
  
Fluent in English, both spoken and written.
  
Sharp analytical and problem-solving skills
  
Team player with an open, positive, and service-oriented mindset
  
Proactive and Driven, you can take your initiatives and see them through
  
Building relationships and the correct formal and informal networks
  
  

**Additional information:**  

Travels for participating in expeditions and workshops are expected
  
We schedule interviews on a rolling basis, do not wait until the end date; apply as soon as possible!

title: Automation Engineer
description:
Our automation engineers tackle exciting and challenging tasks, primarily focusing on marine installations onboard ships. The right candidate has a strong desire to innovate and the confidence to independently handle automation projects related to engines, propulsion system, and energy-producing systems.
  
  

**You will play an important role within:**  

* Conducting on-site supervision during installation and commissioning of automation systems onboard ships.
* Designing and developing automation systems for marine applications.
* Programming and configuring PLCs, HMIs, and SCADA systems for shipboard use.
* Performing service, troubleshooting, and maintenance of automation equipment related to marine engines, propulsion systems and energy-producing systems.
* Working with internal MAN automation systems to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of automation solutions in marine environments.
* Creating detailed documentation and reports after project completion.
* Ensuring compliance with industry standards and safety regulations specific to marine installations.
* Providing technical support and training to clients and team members.


**We imagine that you:**  

* Have a relevant professional education; perhaps you are an electrical engineer or have a degree in automation engineering, however we will provide you with all relevant product knowledge that is required for the job.
* Possess practical experience in programming and maintaining PLCs, HMIs, and SCADA systems, especially in marine environments. Experience with industrial networks and communication protocols is a plus.
* Are flexible and adaptable, capable of managing multiple projects simultaneously.
* Are quality-conscious, service-minded, and able to work independently.
* Proficiency in Swedish or Finnish is mandatory. Have excellent English skills, both spoken and written.
* Are proficient in using the Microsoft Office suite and other relevant software tools.
* Contribute to a positive and healthy working environment within our team.
* Are able to travel: The job will include travel to ships during operation and to shipyards. Travel is normally within Europe, but global travel can be expected from time to time.


**Our offer to you:**  

We offer you a stimulating and challenging job in a driven and exciting environment. You will be part of a small team with the advantage of working within a large global company. We strive to maintain a corporate culture and a flexible working environment. MAN Energy Solutions provides great opportunities for professional and personal development through our PrimeServ Academy. In Sweden, we have a collective agreement with Teknikföretagen and offer excellent employment benefits such as healthcare insurance, flexible working hours, and a healthcare contribution.
  
Where we need you
  
Our premises are located at Oljevägen 105 in Torslanda where we have our office, workshop and FAT test unit. Since this position will include a lot of traveling, you can work remotely. However, it´s important to us that you have the availability to come and meet us in Gothenburg on a regular basis.
  
Welcome to our department and team
  
In our Swedish organization we cooperate closely with our branch office in Finland. Together we are around 75 employees in Sweden and Finland. The automation team consist of 4 service engineers, and one automation manager. The automation team is working closely with our PrimeServ department in Gothenburg and Helsinki. In our group we focus on sharing knowledge and information to continuously develop our team. Our goal is to offer premium service to our customers while providing a motivating and fun place of work for our colleagues. In addition to the strong support locally, you will also have the advantage of working in a large global company with colleagues all over the world. We are a team that has a strong corporate culture and a flexible working environment. MAN Energy Solutions offers great opportunities to develop and grow on a professional and personal level.
  
That is important to us
  
Integrity and Compliance are essential elements of our corporate culture. We firmly support diversity and equal opportunities and are therefore looking forward to receiving a diverse range of applications. The screening process of applications will proceed on ongoing basis. We will close the position as soon as a suitable candidate is found.
  
What you should know about us
  
MAN Energy Solutions enables its customers to achieve sustainable value creation in the transition towards a carbon neutral future. Addressing tomorrow’s challenges within the marine, energy and industrial sectors, we improve efficiency and performance at a systemic level. Leading the way in advanced engineering for more than 250 years, we provide a unique portfolio of technologies. Headquartered in Germany, MAN Energy Solutions employs some 15,000 people at over 120 sites globally. Our after-sales brand, MAN PrimeServ, offers a vast network of service centers to our customers all over the world.

title: Electronics Engineer
description:
**Join Our Team as an Electronics Engineer!**


We are seeking skilled **electronics engineers** to join our dynamic team. Whether your expertise lies in testing or development, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and optimizing cutting-edge electronic systems. Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to create innovative solutions and drive technological advancements in electronics.

### **Your Responsibilities**

* Design and develop electronic systems and components.
* Conduct feasibility studies and create prototypes.
* Work with cross-functional teams on system integration.
* Test and troubleshoot electronic circuits and systems.
* Contribute to innovation and research within electronics engineering.

### **Qualifications**


You don’t need to meet all the qualifications, but having some of them is essential for success:

* Degree in **Electronics/Electrical Engineering** or a related field.
* Hands-on experience with electronics design, simulation, and testing methodologies.
* Familiarity with tools like **Altium** or **Cadence** for PCB and power/analog electronics.
* Knowledge of **digital electronics.**
* Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
* Proven ability to work collaboratively in team environments.
* Experience with **embedded systems**, **electric power technologies**, and software/hardware testing is a plus.


If you’re passionate about electronics and ready to contribute to exciting, impactful projects, we’d love to hear from you! Apply now to join a team where your ideas drive innovation


**Apply today!**

title: Applications Owner
description:
**Applications Owner**

**Bli en viktig del av Perstorps digitaliseringsresa i en roll med stora utvecklingsmöjligheter. Som Applications Owner har du ett brett ansvar för att säkerställa att våra affärskritiska applikationer fungerar effektivt och stödjer våra globala team i deras arbete på siter världen över. Implementera, underhåll och uppgradera applikationer, samarbeta med IT, hantera licenser och bygg relationer med leverantörer. Detta är en varierad roll som passar dig som trivs i en dynamisk miljö där teknik möter affärsprocesser.**

**Om rollen**


Perstorp är på en spännande digitaliseringsresa, och som Applications Owner blir du en del av vårt team för Industriell Digitalisering. Teamet fokuserar på att stötta och utveckla vår svit av applikationer som är avgörande för våra verksamheter världen över.


I rollen har du ansvaret för att säkerställa att våra ingenjörer – från mekanik och el till process och drift – har tillgång till sina affärskritiska applikationer. Ditt arbete kommer att inkludera allt från felsökning och licenshantering till att se över systemens säkerhet och säkerställa att de är uppdaterade och anpassade till våra affärsbehov. Ingenjörsapplikationer kommer att utgöra ditt huvudsakliga fokus, men även andra typer av applikationer ingår i rollens omfattning.


Detta är en bred och varierad roll där du arbetar nära både IT, ingenjörsteam och leverantörer för att knyta samman teknik och affärsprocesser på ett sätt som skapar stort värde för hela organisationen.

**Vad du kommer att göra**

* Leda det dagliga underhållet av applikationerna, inklusive installationer, användarkonton och övervakning.
* Samarbeta nära med IT och leverantörer för att lösa tekniska problem och säkerställa effektiv drift.
* Hålla koll på programvarulicenser, versioner, efterlevnad av säkerhetsprotokoll och systemintegrationer.
* Ansvara för att koordinera licensavtal, inklusive juridiska villkor, licenskostnader och budgetering.
* Ge tekniskt stöd till inköp under förhandlingar och samarbeten med leverantörer och partners.

**Vem är du?**


För att lyckas i denna roll tror vi att du är en självgående, proaktiv och organiserad person som tycker om att ge god service och trivs i en roll med många kontaktytor.


Du har en naturlig förmåga att bygga relationer och nätverk, och du trivs med att samordna och samarbeta med olika intressenter – från ingenjörer och IT-specialister till externa leverantörer.


* Proaktiv och organiserad arbetsstil med stark självdrivande förmåga.
* Erfarenhet av IT-miljöer och tekniska system.
* Förmåga att koordinera och samarbeta med flera olika intressenter.
* Kunskap om Windows-miljöer och erfarenhet av IT-/programvaruimplementeringsprojekt.
* God kommunikativ förmåga på både svenska och engelska.
* Ett affärsmässigt förhållningssätt och erfarenhet av att leverera service och stöd på hög nivå.

**Vad kan vi erbjuda?**  

  

Detta är en möjlighet att ta en varierad och lärorik nyckelroll i vår digitaliseringsresa. Du kommer att ha stora möjligheter att utvecklas och växa i takt med att vi fortsätter att digitalisera och effektivisera våra arbetssätt.


Som en del av Perstorp arbetar du i en internationell miljö med en inkluderande företagskultur där vi värdesätter samarbete, innovation och hållbarhet. Du får även ta del av förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag, möjlighet till hybridarbete, privat sjukvårdsförsäkring och ett generöst pensionssparande – allt för att skapa en balans mellan karriär, hälsa och framtid.


Om detta stämmer detta överens med dig och dina intressen, skicka din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi behandlar ansökningar löpande, sista ansökningsdag är 2025-01-19.

**Övrig information**

* Denna position är en tillsvidareanställning med utgångspunkt i antingen Perstorp, Malmö eller Stenungsund.
* Rollen rapporterar till Director OPEX ID (Operational Excellence Industrial Digitalization) men stödjer även GTI-organisationen (Global Technology & Investments).
* För mer information om rollen, kontakta gärna Ulf Andrén, System Support Engineer på ulf.andren@perstorp.com. För andra frågor, kontakta Talent Acquisition Specialist Emil Gretland på emil.gretland@perstorp.com.
* Om du vill komma i kontakt med en facklig representant kan du kontakta Per Igglund (Akademikerna) på per.igglund@perstorp.com, Rickard Martinsson (Unionen) på rickard.martinsson@perstorp.com eller Rebecka Lundell (IF Metall) på rebecka.lundell@perstorp.com.

***About Perstorp***

*Perstorp believes in improving everyday life – making it safer, more convenient and more environmentally sound for billions of people all over the world. As a world leading specialty chemicals company, our innovations provide essential properties for products used every day and everywhere. You’ll find us all the way from your car and mobile phone to towering wind turbines and the local dairy farm. Simply put, we work to make good products even better, with a clear sustainability agenda.*

*Founded in Sweden in 1881, Perstorp’s focused innovation builds on more than 140 years of experience, representing a complete chain of solutions in organic chemistry, process technology and application development. Perstorp has approximately 1,500 employees and manufacturing units in Asia, Europe and North America. Sales in 2022 amounted to 15.3 billion SEK. Perstorp is a wholly-owned subsidiary of PETRONAS Chemicals Group Berhad (PCG), Malaysia´s leading integrated chemicals provider and part of PETRONAS Group.*

*Learn more at* *www.perstorp.com*

*Systemägare,* *Applikationsförvaltare,* *Systemförvaltare,* *IT Service Manager,* *Product Owner,* *Application Manager* *Systemansvarig,* *IT Systems Manager,* *Technical Product Manager,* *Software Asset Manager*

title: Test and Verification Engineer
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **5+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

  

Rollbeskrivning:


Test engineer within Core System Components needs wide and deep understanding of relevant technologies within **development** and **test** of **HW**, **SW**, **CI**, and **system safety**. To be successful in this role you need to be open minded towards new tools and solutions. You need to be skilled in **Autosar**, the primarily operating system.  

You are fluent in English, written and spoken.  

  

**Experience from below is considered meritorious:**  

* Skilled in AUTOSAR
* Embedded software development
* Configuration management software
* Software release
* Python
* CAN and Automotive Ethernet communications
* HIL systems and real-time simulation
* Canoe
* Continuous Integration, Verification and Development
* Platform development
* Proven ability to build and maintain long term roadmaps and technical evolution plans
**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Test Automation Engineer to ABB Marine & Ports
description:
**Test Automation Engineer to ABB Marine & Ports**
==================================================

#### **At ABB, we are dedicated to addressing global challenges. Our core values: care, courage, curiosity, and collaboration - combined with a focus on diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities - are key drivers in our aim to empower everyone to create sustainable solutions. That's our story. Make it your story.**

### **Your role and responsibilities**


In this role you will be part of the Ports business line within the Marine and Ports division that is specialized in advanced automation and information systems for all types of container and bulk cargo handling cranes, as well as OCR and electrical systems for container terminals. We offer an international and dynamic working environment where our business delivers advanced technology in large projects across the world in a customer oriented and highly globalized industry. As a member of the system design department, you will be responsible for the development and continuous improvement of our crane system integration test. In this important role, you will actively work with implementation of automated tests, system verification, and quality feedback to our product teams as well as taking lead to ensure we work according to best practices within test and verification. Your responsibilities: • Verify our crane system releases by establishing and maintaining an automated system test environment including tests. • Continuously improve our test environment and test coverage based on requirements and functionality. • Develop and improve on automated test solutions and tools. • Work with continuous improvement of our software engineering practices within simulations and tests in high collaboration with development teams. • Expanding your knowledge base of best practices in test automation.

### **Qualifications for the role**

* A bachelor’s degree or higher in Robotics, Automation, Computer Science or similar.
* Minimum two years of test experience from embedded products, process industry, railway or similar.
* Capability to work with and learn IEC 61131-3 FBD/ST, C/C++, Python, Linux environments and embedded systems.
* Programming knowledge to implement automated tests in suitable environment.
* Confidence in taking technical leadership developing state-of-the-art test methodology.

### **More about us**


ABB Marine & Ports designs and develops intelligent terminal automation solutions and services for container and bulk cargo handling as well as world-leading technologies that are driving the evolution of sustainable shipping. Data-driven decision support and integrated solutions for ship and shore from ABB are paving the way to a zero-emission marine industry, and optimized container terminals. Our automation and electrical solutions are making port and terminal operations safer, greener and more productive. ABB Marine & Ports operates in 26 countries and has 2,000 employees. Learn more about what we do at www.abb.com/ports Recruiting Manager Pontus Klang, +46 722 15 94 09, will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives - Sveriges Ingenjörer: Mikael Blomqvist, +46 768 06 00 11; Ledarna: Leif Öhrberg, +46 724 64 40 16; Unionen: Krista Andersson, +46 706 44 02 85. Talent Partner: Johannes Westermark Hester. We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe. #MyABBStory Last day to apply is January 19th. Apply today and secure your spot in the recruitment process! Please note that we will not be reviewing candidates during the Holiday weeks, expect some delays in feedback. Please note that, to be eligible for employment at ABB AB, you will need to pass our pre-employment screening steps. This includes a reference check, a drug test and could also include a background check. We kindly decline any direct contact with staffing and recruitment agencies as well as sellers of additional job advertisements.
company_description: ABB is a leading global technology company that energizes the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future.

title: Senior Verification Engineer
description:
### **Senior Verification Engineer**

***Are you a Senior Verification Engineer looking for your next opportunity within product development?***

**Here you can make your mark and demonstrate how the very best organisations transfer products from R&D into a manufacturing environment.**


Biotage is looking for a driven colleague to join our successful Swedish Global Life Science company. Biotage is an industry leader, developing innovative and effective platform products for the Pharma, BioPharma, Biotech, Diagnostic and Environmental industries. Biotages’ products ease our customers’ workflow in the discovery and development of new therapies.


Our open position is within the Verification and Validation (V&V) at R&D. The V&V team is responsible for verification and validation of systems both during product development and within the product care process. The core of the V&V process is to assess the product quality throughout the product life cycle. Requirement management, risk analysis and root-cause analyses are tools that we use in the process. Our primary goal is to ensure that the developed system satisfies its intended use and user needs. Keeping the product lifecycle and quality perspective is important to us.


As a driven and proactive Verification Engineer within V&V, you ensure product quality and efficiency through all phases of the product development. You will work as a verification lead within the project teams to develop new instruments and consumables. The role involves networking with internal stakeholders and working as part of a multi- disciplinary team to deliver the highest quality products and processes.


Product optimisations (improvements to the existing product portfolio) are also key aspects of this role. You will be encouraged to independently run small projects and tasks aimed at improving our existing products.


Biotage offers an innovative, collaborative and fertile work environment where you work and learn with stakeholders in regional marketing, R&D, supply chain, the global service team and customer support, to deliver the very best products and processes. As a valued Verification Engineer, you will be an essential part of Biotage R&D, liaising with and reporting to the Director of Verification & Validation (V&V), based at Biotage Headquarters in Uppsala, Sweden.

### **Job scope outline**


We work with newly developed systems, which entail hardware, software and often a consumable (e.g. column for separation). The job involves:

* Lead and perform activities withing the function and develop ways of working.
* Serve as a subject matter expert for quality related issues within product development
* Supervise peers
* Take a hands-on approach to verification and testing and ensure adherence to quality standards
* Define and evaluate system requirements
* Develop test cases from requirements
* Drive, coordinate, perform and evaluate test, verification and validation tasks on a system level
* Document and administrate changes in our product life-cycle management systems
* Perform and review technical investigations (e.g. risk assessments and root-cause analyses)
* Collaborate with team members to troubleshoot issues, optimize performance, and deliver tasks on schedule.
* Actively contribute to, and lead, continuous improvement of ways of working within the team

### **Education and Experience**

* Minimum BSc in Systems, Mechanical, Chemical, Electrical Engineering or similar
* Broad experience within verification, validation or testing
* Knowledge in regulatory framework applicable for laboratory equipment (e.g Low Voltage Directive LVD and Machinery Directive MD)
* Skilled in requirement management
* Proficiency in transforming requirements into test cases for verification, as well as generating comprehensive documentation
* Skilled in risk management
* Experience within product development or quality assurance
* Experience from a controlled business or good documentation practice from elsewhere

##### **It is a merit if you also have experience of:**

* Experience working with ISO 9001, ISO 13485
* Experience as a verification, test or project lead
* Experience in project coordination or mentoring
* Experience with working with agile methods and Lean methodology

#### **Desired skills and qualities**

* To excel in this role, you should possess problem-solving skills and enjoy collaborating with others to achieve qualitative results
* As a person you are driven, independent, curious and proactive
* You have a quality focus and value the importance of product life-cycle management
* Personal drive and commitment are highly valued
* You possess a structured way of working
* Fluent in English, both written and verbally
* Advanced Swedish

### **Application**


We look forward to receiving your application, together with CV and a personal letter, no later than 5th of January 2025. In this recruitment we work together with our consultant Charlotta Babington Thorzelius. If you have any questions regarding the process please contact her on charlotta@hurekaresources.se

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**THE OPPORTUNITY IN A NUTSHELL**
**You?** 
 A frontend developer with 1-2 years' experience, eager to learn more about frontend and build awesome apps that users love! You’re collaborative, curious, creative, and focused on delivering quality.
   

  

**Role?** 
 As part of the Integrations team, you’ll build and refine the user-facing parts of our products, integrating useful partner offerings at natural points in the user journey.
   

  

**Tech stack?** 
 We have a wide range of apps and pick what fits best. Of course we’re using HTML, CSS, and JS! For frameworks we have Vue.js or Svelte with Fastify servers - and all teams include Podium with Eik to build micro-frontends.
   

  

**Location?** 
 We embrace a hybrid work approach and invite you to join us in our office in Stockholm for 2 days a week. If you’re not the working-from-home kind of person, you are of course welcome in our office every day. With team members also based in Oslo, there’s some possibility for travel!
   

  

**Why us?** 
 We’re a small team with a history of success, which has given us the trust and freedom to try new ideas and make our own decisions. You’ll team up with a senior frontend developer to collaborate and learn from. We set aside time to learn, experiment, and find better ways of working - so you’ll have room and support to sharpen your skills and gain real experience.
   

  

**Sounds like your cup of tea? Check out the details below!**
**WHO ARE YOU?**
* You have 1-2 years experience building web interfaces with some knowledge of a frontend framework like React or Vue.js. The more comfortable you are with HTML, CSS, and JS the better!
* You collaborate well in cross-functional teams, partnering closely with product managers, UX designers, and backend developers. You know when to speak tech with the backenders or simplify things for the business folks!
* We love accessible, responsive, and fun designs and hopefully you do too! If you’re good at spotting that 1 pixel off of alignment you’re in good company - we don’t ship until we’re happy with the quality we’re putting out.
* You’re open to learning new tools, suggesting improvements to processes, and exploring better ways to solve problems.


**WHAT’S THE JOB LIKE?**
 You’ll join our Integrations team within the Advertising area—soon to be 10 people strong—where we integrate product offerings into our marketplaces, creating natural connections for both our users and partners.
   

  

 It’s not just about shipping features; it’s about understanding what users need and what partners bring to the table, and then making smart choices that balance both. Our products need to be relevant and helpful, without shouting for attention. Together with a Product Manager, UX Designer, Business Developer, and other Frontend and Backend Developers, you’ll build and refine the user-facing parts of these integrations. Everyone here is part of a cross-functional team, collaborating across disciplines and locations to ensure our efforts are aligned and impactful.
   

  

 Your daily routine involves coding new features, improving existing ones, and ensuring users feel happy and productive with any of our apps. You’ll also spend time discussing ideas with teammates, sharing feedback on design proposals, and reviewing code.
   

  

 Over the next 12 months, the projects you’ll touch range from launching our flagship product into new regions and taking over existing solutions in other markets, to rolling out brand-new products where we haven’t ventured before. At the same time, you’ll be part of redesigning our technical architecture so we can handle more diverse products and bigger audiences. This blend of expanding our reach while rethinking our foundations means you can have a tangible impact on how we work and how we grow.
   

  

**THE CHALLENGE AND THE OPPORTUNITY**
 This is a team in motion. We’re growing across countries and evolving our systems at the same time. That can be demanding, but it also means you get to influence how we do things—from how we shape the code to how we collaborate across Sweden and Norway. By embracing these changes, you’ll help us build stronger connections for users and partners alike, and create a flexible setup that can adapt as we continue to grow. In short, you’ll play a key role in turning complexity into a clear path forward.
   

  

**GOT YOUR ATTENTION? Let us hear from you!**
 Turn yourself in by 31st of January. We will start going through the applications from 13th of January and assess them as they’re submitted.
   

  

**About Schibsted Marketplaces**
 Blocket, FINN, DBA, Bilbasen, Oikotie & Tori. Did you spot any familiar names? Then you already know a bit about Schibsted Marketplaces! We joined forces in January 2023, collaborating closely at the Nordic level to enhance the user-friendliness of our marketplaces. With colleagues all around the Nordics, we share a passion for our work and foster a friendly and caring community. Curiosity, teamwork, problem-solving and continuous learning are the cornerstones of our culture.
   

  

 Currently, we’re embarking on an exciting journey of becoming a fully marketplace-focused company holding together 40+ brands. Our mission is to empower people to make smart choices for themselves and future generations, and that’s why our future direction is all about staying agile and proactive in the rapidly evolving digital landscape — shaping the future of digital marketplaces!
   

  

 Have a sneak peek at our day-to-day life on LinkedIn & Instagram, and get to know the Schibsted Tech & Shetech Communities along with the Schibsted Talks podcast hosted by our very own colleagues.
   

  

 Inclusion for us means creating a fair workspace where each of us is respected, celebrated for who we are, and given equal opportunities to thrive. Check out more here about our commitment to Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging.
   

  

**QUESTIONS?**
 Talent Acquisition Partner, Jelena Briois is happy to assist with questions. She can be best reached at jelena.briois@schibsted.com.

title: Systemutvecklare Java
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Technology, Information and Media
description:
Om rollen
   

  

 Vill du utvecklas i en miljö där innovation, gemenskap och samhällsnytta står i fokus? Hos Sopra Steria får du arbeta med digitala lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad – tillsammans med drivna kollegor i ett företag som prisats som
 *Sveriges bästa arbetsplats* 
 av Great Place to Work. Vi söker nu fler Javautvecklare till våra agila team i Stockholm!
   

  

 Som Javautvecklare hos oss blir du en del av våra agila teamleveranser, där du arbetar nära både kollegor och kunder för att utveckla lösningar som bidrar till samhällsnytta och teknisk innovation. Våra projekt är ofta långsiktiga och inkluderar tekniklyft hos kunder inom exempelvis offentlig sektor.
   

  

 I rollen får du jobba med modern teknik som Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes och ramverk som Angular, React eller Vue. Vi har en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning och gemenskap, där du blir en viktig del av vårt utvecklarcommunity. Läs mer här!
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling.
* Är nyfiken på nya tekniker och värdesätter kunskapsdelning.
* Trivs med att samarbeta nära kunder och kollegor.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.


**Varför Sopra Steria?**
* En arbetsplats som förenar trygghet och flexibilitet.
* Prisbelönt företagskultur med fokus på gemenskap och personlig utveckling.
* Spännande projekt som gör skillnad i samhället.
* Ett starkt team där du utvecklas tillsammans med kompetenta och hjälpsamma kollegor.


**Ansökan**
 Låter det som något för dig? Skicka in ditt CV redan idag! Ansök enkelt via vår hemsida. Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta vår rekryterare Hanna Korell på
 **[email protected]** 
 .
   

  

 Vi arbetar med löpande urval, så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Senior Software Engineer Frontend
description:
*Would you like to take part in transforming healthcare? Qbtech is the global market leader in professional ADHD tests, providing tests that are both CE marked and FDA cleared for use as an aid in the assessment and treatment evaluation of ADHD for people age 6-60. Our vision is to transform healthcare by providing a complete system of leading objective tests, products and services that empowers clinical and financial decision-makers to improve outcomes and support patients to better understand their symptoms and treatment.*
*Qbtech is present in 14 countries with offices in Stockholm, London and Houston. Over the next years, Qbtech will make significant investments into new products, technologies and people to further strengthen their services and product offerings with the aim of building an ecosystem with solutions for providers, clinicians and patients.*
**About The Role**
 A Senior Software Engineer Frontend works in our product engineering team with Javascript web app development.
   

  

 The main focus of the work is coding (development) but a Senior Software Engineer works with the entire software delivery lifecycle (see duties and responsibilities below).
   

  

**Essential Duties And Responsibilities**
* Contribute to, define and document new product features & technical requirements. Develop code that delivers the functionality based on requirements and mitigations.
* Bug fixing and Code reviews for peers
* Maintain and improve legacy code
* App provisioning (software deployment, CICD pipeline management, etc.)
* Provide technical expertise to support problem-solving and troubleshooting.
* Keeping up-to-date with industry trends and technology developments


**Who are you?**
* Extensive development skills with Javascript and related web technologies (CSS, markup/HTML)
* Deep knowledge of the ReactJS framework
* Deep knowledge about some relevant 3rd party libraries such as Redux, React router, SASS etc.
* Experience of working with service integrations using REST or GraphQL as protocol
* Experience from working with Agile development methodologies
* Someone who can contribute actively with hands-on development
* Someone who can clearly articulate architectural changes and work seamlessly with different stakeholders.
* Strong problem-solving mentality
* Strong collaboration and communication skills
* Excellent written and verbal skills


**We Are Looking For Someone Who Has**
* Bachelor's of Master's Degree in Software Engineering or Relevant Field
* Fluent in English
* At least 8 years documented experience
* Extensive hands-on experience and knowledge of development, both from an architectural perspective and hands-on development


**Job Type**
 Full time. Based in Stockholm Office at least 3 days per week.
   

  

**What can Qbtech offer you?**
 At Qbtech you will have the opportunity to work with something meaningful that helps people understand ADHD while transforming healthcare. You will work in an international environment together with some of the leading experts in the world. You will lead the development of best in class as well as first in class products and services – globally. There are plenty of opportunities to learn and grow and to expand into other technologies within the company. Qbtech also offers education and certifications in fields that are relevant to the technology used within the company.

title: System Test Engineer
description:
***System Test Engineer inom Automotive***




 We live and breathe innovation – We enjoy the ride
 







*CabinAir har som mål att förbättra hälsa, säkerhet och välbefinnande för förare och passagerare genom att producera branschledande lösningar för luftrening i kupéer för bilar, lastbilar, bussar och andra fordon.* 








*Är du redo att göra en verklig skillnad för luftkvaliteten i bilar? CabinAir expanderar, och vi söker en* 
***System Test Engineer***
*till vårt innovativa team!* 




  





**Vad du kommer att göra** 




 Bli en del av CabinAir och bidra till renare luft för förare och passagerare. Som
 **System Test Engineer** 
 på CabinAir kommer du att ha en central roll i att omvandla krav och förväntningar från våra intressenter till tydliga systemtestkrav för verifiering och validering. Du kommer att leda systemtestaktiviteter och säkerställa att våra produktvarianter och kundspecifikationer är i perfekt samklang. Genom att agera som en kvalitetssäkrare säkerställer du att leveranser från designpartners och leverantörer håller högsta standard innan de når våra kunder.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden** 



* **Ledarskap och samarbete** 
 : Stötta, informera och klargör prestanda och egenskaper hos målprodukten som ska verifieras och valideras. Dela med dig av din expertis och bästa praxis.
* **Kravhantering** 
 : Analysera kravens genomförbarhet och relevans genom tvärfunktionell analys av produktdesign och gällande standarder. Översätt dessa till strukturerade tester för verifiering och validering.
* **Spårbarhet och kravkontroll:** 
 Säkerställ att det finns tydlig spårbarhet och kontroll mellan krav, verifiering och validering med hjälp av våra interna verktyg och processer.
* **Kund- och leverantörskommunikation** 
 : Driv dialogen med kunder och leverantörer för att säkerställa samsyn kring systemfunktioner, prestanda, krav och förväntningar.


- 


**Vem du är** 




 Du är en resultatdriven person med en stark förmåga att få saker gjorda och en passion för att alltid sätta kundernas behov i första rummet. Du brinner för att leverera högkvalitativa resultat och har en förmåga att ta initiativ för att hitta lösningar. Samarbetsförmåga och att kunna arbeta självständigt är viktigt för dig, och du trivs med att lösa komplexa uppgifter. Du är noggrann, strukturerad och kan uttrycka dig tydligt på engelska, både muntligt och skriftligt.
 



  





**Kvalifikationer** 



* Akademisk bakgrund inom ingenjörsvetenskap eller ett relaterat område.
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av systemtestning, gärna inom fordonsindustrin eller andra reglerade industrier med höga standarder.
* Starka organisatoriska och kommunikativa färdigheter, med förmåga att effektivt samarbeta över avdelningar och ge tydlig vägledning.
* Erfarenhet av elektronik (hårdvara/mjukvara) är meriterande.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av systemverifiering av inbyggda system är ett plus.
* Utmärkta problemlösningsförmågor och ett skarpt öga för detaljer.
* Flytande engelska, både i tal och skrift.



 I rollen rapporterar du till Head of R&D och arbetar nära R&D-teamet i Sverige och Kina, samt samarbetar dagligen med PMO, Operations och Sales & Marketing.
 



  





**Varför välja CabinAir?** 



* Bli en del av ett innovativt och växande företag som leder utvecklingen av lösningar för renare luft inom fordonsindustrin.
* Arbeta nära våra globala FoU-team i Sverige och Kina, samt samarbeta med avdelningar som PMO, Operations och Sales & Marketing.
* Var med och forma framtiden genom att bidra till en renare och hälsosammare värld.



 Ansök nu och bli en del av vår resa mot en renare framtid!
 



**Vilka vi är** 




 Vi är stolta pionjärer som har haft den mest avancerade luftreningstekniken sedan dag ett. Genom att ständigt utmana konventionellt tänkande och drivas av innovationsglädje, är vi fast beslutna att leverera lösningar som förbättrar hälsa och välbefinnande för förare och passagerare världen över.
 



 Med huvudkontor i Stockholm, där alla funktioner är representerade, är vi ett snabbt växande internationellt team av passionerade medarbetare. Vår fabrik och FoU finns i Shenzhen, och vi har försäljningskontor i Shanghai och Los Angeles. Totalt är vi cirka 80 engagerade CabinAir-medarbetare.
 



 Vår teknik är redan en integrerad del av Advanced Air Cleaner (AAC) i fordon från Volvo Cars och Polestar 3 – några av världens mest ansedda tillverkare när det gäller hälsa och säkerhet. Dessutom har vi nyligen tecknat avtal med premiumfordonstillverkare i Europa, USA och Kina. Parallellt med detta lanserar vi vår teknik för bilar som redan rullar på vägarna.
 



**Nästa steg** 




 Tycker du att detta låter intressant och delar du våra värderingar:
 **Proud, Quality, Character** 
 och
 **Dedicated** 
 ? Om svaret är ja, ser vi fram emot din ansökan senast den 8 januari 2025 (intervjuer sker löpande).
 



 Om du erbjuds tjänsten kommer vi att be om en bakgrundskontroll från belastningsregistret.
 



 Observera att alla sökande måste ha ett giltigt arbetstillstånd och visum för att arbeta i Sverige. CabinAir tillhandahåller inte stöd eller sponsring för att erhålla dessa dokument.
 



 Vi accepterar endast direkta jobbansökningar (ej via rekryterings- eller bemanningsföretag).
 



**Tillsammans skapar vi en hälsosammare resa – och vi är bara i början!** 




 Ansök idag och bli en del av vår spännande resa!

title: Salesforce Developer
description:
**Salesforce Developer** 




 We are looking for an experienced developer with hands-on experience in Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and hands-on experience in the
 **Salesforce platform** 
 with focus on designing, developing, and maintaining scalable CRM solutions within the SAFe agile framework..
 



  





  





**We are looking for someone with:** 



* Minimum 3 years of
 
 hands-on experience in Salesforce with focus on designing, developing, and maintaining scalable CRM solutions
* Experience working agile and preferably using the SAFe framework
* Fluent in Swedish and English, enabling effective communication with local and international stakeholders.



  





  





**Technical Qualifications:** 



* Salesforce Experience, for example:
* Sales Cloud
* Service Cloud
* Marketing Cloud
* Data Cloud
* Technical Skills:
* Apex: Proficient in writing custom Apex code for complex business logic.
* Lightning Web Components (LWC): Experience with LWC development
* Integrations: Knowledge of integrating Salesforce with external systems using REST, SOAP, and other APIs.
* HTML/CSS: Comfortable with creating visually appealing and responsive UI components.
* Relevant Salesforce certifications of the above



  





  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Develop and maintain custom Salesforce functionality using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning components.
* Design, implement and optimize data models, workflows, and automations to streamline business processes.
* Design, Implement and optimize Salesforce solutions tailored to client needs.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Salesforce applications as part of a maintenance process with our customers.
* Provide expert guidance on Salesforce best practices and industry standards.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
* Utilize Agile methodologies, including SAFe, to manage and execute projects efficiently.



  





  





**As a person you have:** 



* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Excellent communication skills.



  





  





**About Sirocco:** 




 Sirocco is one of Sweden's oldest management consulting firms specializing in CRM. We provide tailored solutions to meet unique business needs and challenges, working closely with our clients to streamline and improve their sales, service, marketing, or CPQ processes. Our expertise lies in implementing solutions across leading SaaS platforms such as Salesforce, Microsoft, HubSpot, Tacton, and more. With 70 colleagues across 5 countries, we offer flexible solutions to businesses of all sizes.
 



  





  





**Application** 




 Are you interested? Apply today through linkedin.

title: Systemutvecklare Java
description:
Om rollen
   

  

 Vill du utvecklas i en miljö där innovation, gemenskap och samhällsnytta står i fokus? Hos Sopra Steria får du arbeta med digitala lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad – tillsammans med drivna kollegor i ett företag som prisats som
 *Sveriges bästa arbetsplats* 
 av Great Place to Work. Vi söker nu fler Javautvecklare till våra agila team i Stockholm!
   

  

 Som Javautvecklare hos oss blir du en del av våra agila teamleveranser, där du arbetar nära både kollegor och kunder för att utveckla lösningar som bidrar till samhällsnytta och teknisk innovation. Våra projekt är ofta långsiktiga och inkluderar tekniklyft hos kunder inom exempelvis offentlig sektor.
   

  

 I rollen får du jobba med modern teknik som Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes och ramverk som Angular, React eller Vue. Vi har en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning och gemenskap, där du blir en viktig del av vårt utvecklarcommunity. Läs mer här!
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling.
* Är nyfiken på nya tekniker och värdesätter kunskapsdelning.
* Trivs med att samarbeta nära kunder och kollegor.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift.


**Varför Sopra Steria?**
* En arbetsplats som förenar trygghet och flexibilitet.
* Prisbelönt företagskultur med fokus på gemenskap och personlig utveckling.
* Spännande projekt som gör skillnad i samhället.
* Ett starkt team där du utvecklas tillsammans med kompetenta och hjälpsamma kollegor.


**Ansökan**
 Låter det som något för dig? Skicka in ditt CV redan idag! Ansök enkelt via vår hemsida. Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta vår rekryterare Hanna Korell på
 **[email protected]** 
 .
   

  

 Vi arbetar med löpande urval, så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Application Expert/Data Engineer (Anaplan)
description:
**Job Description**
 As an Application Expert, you will work in a team that delivers high-quality Anaplan solutions for financial forecasting. You'll need a strong technical background, expertise in model building and data integration, and familiarity with finance/controlling.
   

  

**Key Responsibility:**
* Develop Anaplan solutions for business needs, including data models, in a digestible way.
* Build the models in Anaplan to support the planning process of the specific business unit.
* Ensure every build meets the highest standards always with quality assured data.
* Collaborate with a wider team of Product Manager, Solution Architects, Business & Application experts as a part of an agile team.
* Work closely with the source and/or target systems for integrating data.


**Qualifications**
* 2+ years of experience building financial forecasting solutions (preferably in Anaplan).
* Strong technical background in building models and integrations, as well as having the ability to transform business needs into a working solution.
* Experience in the finance/controlling area and familiar with terms as Cost Centers and Profit & Loss reporting.
* Experience of building strategies for integrating data into the models.
* Experience of working in an agile way, with the confidence to continuously look for and suggest improvements.
* Show pride in solid documentation as well as building well-designed solutions.
* Be self-driven and well organized, with the ability to communicate in a clear and supportive way.


**Additional Information**
 This is a
 **fulltime permanent position** 
 , starting as soon as possible according to agreement. The role is an on-site position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden. Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page. If you have any questions about the role, please contact responsible recruiter Taskeen Zahra at taskeen.zahra@hm.com
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*
**Inclusion & Diversity**
 At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.
   

  

**Company Description**
 H&M Group is a family of brands; H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET and Afound. At H&M Group, our people are the driving force behind our commitment to creating meaningful growth and more sustainable lifestyles. Help us re-imagine fashion and together we will re-shape our industry. Learn more about H&M Group here.

title: Technical Engineer (Senior/Expert)
description:
The Lead
 **Technical Engineer (Solution Architect)** 
 is
 **responsible for designing and implementing comprehensive solutions that leverage AI, AIOps, data science, and machine learning to enhance Predictive and Proactive Operations.** 
 This role involves collaborating with stakeholders, understanding technical requirements, and ensuring the alignment of solutions with architectural standards and best practices. The role also focuses on reducing technical debt, enabling holistic and strategic thinking, and delivering value-driven solutions aligned with business goals.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




**Solution Design and Implementation:** 




 Develop and implement technical solutions using AI and machine learning to predict and proactively manage operational challenges.
 



 Translate business needs and technical requirements into architectural blueprints, ensuring solutions align with organizational and technology standards.
 



 Create architectural designs incorporating predictive analytics and AI-driven insights using tools such as Splunk, Dynatrace, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and Vertex AI.
 



 Identify interdependencies and apply holistic thinking to ensure cross-team and cross-initiative alignment.
 



 Analyze, design, develop, maintain, and communicate solution roadmaps and transition architectures.
 



  





**Stakeholder Collaboration:** 




 Work closely with business analysts, product managers, and development teams to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
 



 Bridge the understanding of business, organizational, and technical implications of proposed solutions with stakeholders.
 



 Facilitate alignment between teams to ensure solutions are value-driven, on-time, and meet quality standards.
 



  





**Technical Expertise:** 




 Stay updated on trends in AI, machine learning, and AIOps to identify and apply advancements in solving operational challenges.
 



 Provide guidance on options, risks, and benefits when proposing solutions.
 



 Evaluate and recommend tools, technologies, and methodologies, including AI/ML lifecycle management practices and platforms like Vertex AI or Azure equivalents.
 



 Oversee implementation of solutions, focusing on reducing technical debt and enhancing end-to-end business value.
 



  





**Documentation and Communication:** 




 Document and communicate architectural plans, solutions, and decisions effectively using tools like Confluence and Jira.
 



 Ensure solution documentation supports implementation, maintenance, and audit processes.
 



 Facilitate knowledge sharing across teams and stakeholders.
 



  





**Quality Assurance and Continuous Improvement:** 




 Ensure implemented solutions adhere to industry standards and business requirements.
 



 Conduct reviews and audits to maintain architectural principles and identify improvement opportunities.
 



 Evaluate the solution lifecycle to optimize performance and cost-effectiveness.
 



  





**Leadership and Mentorship:** 




 Provide leadership and mentoring to junior architects and technical team members.
 



 Foster a collaborative, innovative, and learning-focused team environment.
 



 Teach architectural thinking and facilitate best practices across the engineering community.
 



  





**Qualifications:** 




**Education:** 




 Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
 



 Advanced degrees or certifications in AI, machine learning, or cloud architecture (e.g., GCP, Azure) are a plus.
 



  





**Experience:** 




 Minimum of 7 years of experience in software engineering, solution architecture, or equivalent roles, with 2+ years in a Solution Architecture capacity.
 



 Proven experience designing solutions that integrate AI, data science, or AIOps technologies.
 



 Strong track record in implementing large-scale solutions in diverse and complex environments.
 



 Experience in data architecture and high-volume system design for retail or operational environments.
 



 Experience working in large-scale agile organizations (e.g., SAFe) is preferred.
 



  





**Technical Proficiency:** 




 Expertise in cloud platforms such as Azure and Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including tools like Vertex AI for machine learning deployment.
 



 Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, and frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch.
 



 Knowledge of ITSM tools like ServiceNow and monitoring tools like Splunk and Dynatrace.
 



 Experience in software architecture principles, patterns, and methodologies, including documentation using formal notations such as ArchiMate.
 



 Strong understanding of modern development practices, including MLOps, data pipelines, and lifecycle management.
 



  





**Skills:** 




 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on delivering business value.
 



 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate across teams and stakeholders.
 



 Ability to contextualize technical solutions with business goals and strategies.
 



 Expertise in identifying interdependencies, applying holistic thinking, and enabling seamless collaboration across teams.
 



  





**Preferred:** 




 Certifications in cloud architecture (GCP, Azure) or modern development practices are a merit.
 



 Experience with third-party vendor integration and procurement processes.
 



 Knowledge of AI-driven solutions for Predictive and Proactive Operations.
 



  





**Specific Needs in Predictive and Proactive Operations:** 




 Strong background in data science, statistical modeling, and algorithm development.
 



 Proven ability to deliver AI-driven solutions for operational optimization.
 



 Focus on SLA compliance, reducing MTTR, and building scalable solutions to improve business resilience.

title: Mainframe Engineer | SEB, Solna
description:
Are you interested in working with SEB Mainframe environment that is facing major changes? Are you a driven sysprog with experience from working with mainframe? Do you want to work proactively with modernization and have a commitment in IT security? If so, this might be a great opportunity for You!
   

  

 We need to strengthen our Security team that works towards the mainframe platform. The team is part of SEB Technology and located in Solna in the Stockholm area. Mainframe is a vital platform within SEB where we work a lot with modernization and where many different initiatives are ongoing in the area of security.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an engineer in the security team, you will be working with authentication and authorization including ICSF, encryption and key management for the platform. Another part in the job includes development and management of various code connected to this area of responsibility. Testing and developing solutions in connection with new products or other changes together with other teams is also part of the work.
   

  

 You will also be responsible, together with the team of six persons, for daily maintenance, support to other teams and system development for security related issues. Security is of highest importance for SEB as we are exploring and acting in a new landscape of banking such as Open Banking, API-ecosystem and AI.
   

  

 Your job is to be on the edge of security matters as well as being our evangelist of our security journey we need to embark.
   

  

 To thrive in this role, we believe you have
   

  

 You are a skilled technician/engineer/developer with experience of the Mainframe platform with an expertise on security.
   

  

 We presume you have worked with z/OS and TSO, and also is familiar with SMP/E installations. Knowledge and previous experience working with industry standards within the area (e.g., PCI-DSS, NIST, STIG) is eligible.
   

  

 Experience within ACF2 or RACF, zSecure and zMFA is advantageous.
   

  

 Development experience is beneficial and helpful in this job, preferable REXX and Assembler.
   

  

 You are a team player who appreciates and understands the importance of teamwork and working in an agile team. For this role, we also see that you have good knowledge of Swedish and English, both spoken and written.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Friendly and welcoming culture.
* Innovative company at the forefront of technology.
* Agile and modern way of working.
* Extensive training and learning opportunities.
* We apply a hybrid model where we work 3 days at the office and 2 days from home.


 Ready to take the next step on your career journey?
   

  

 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-01-07. Please be aware that the recruitment process and response time might take a bit longer than usual due to the Christmas holiday. If you have questions about the position, please contact Anneli Risberg, team manager for MI Infrastructure & Security on anneli.risberg @seb.se
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Technical Designer
description:
Battlefield is a storied franchise renowned for uncompromising combat gameplay for over two decades. 100 million players and 5 billion hours played later, the Battlefield team is looking to define the future of the first-person shooter. Comprised of 4 world-class studios across Criterion, DICE, Motive and Ripple Effect – all powered by the Battlefield Central Technology (BCT) team – what’s forming on the horizon is a connected Battlefield universe filled with immersive experiences built on our unique DNA.
   

  

 LET’S PUSH THINGS FORWARD
   

  

 DICE is a creative studio with offices in Stockholm and Gothenburg. We believe in the power of diversity and welcome game creators from all backgrounds to collaborate with us as we unlock the potential for the future of Battlefield!
   

  

 We’re always pushing to be at the forefront of creative entertainment - blending digital art, design, and technology to push boundaries. Our collaborative culture is fueled by passion, driving innovation and making a positive difference for our players and community.
   

  

 At DICE, your ideas matter. We offer an inclusive space where you can thrive, be yourself, and grow alongside a team dedicated to making a meaningful impact to the world of gaming.
   

  

 We’re all-in on the future and our most ambitious Battlefield yet. Want to be part of something special? Read on.
   

  

 DICE is looking for a Experienced Technical Designer for onsite or hybrid work. You will report to the project Technical Design Director. You will support other designers, help problem solve, enhance their skills and foster a culture of innovation and excellence. You will help develop the tools and workflows required to deliver a great project as part of the Technical Design Team.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Support members of the design team by providing guidance on features and workflows; you are a principal point of escalation for designers and programmers.
* Resolve technical problems related to software development, ensuring performance and functionality.
* Help establish best practices for other disciplines.
* Alongside the Technical Design Team, you will identify and lead the development of new design workflows and features.
* Playtest and improve on gadgets, weapons, core mechanics, collecting feedback, and making improvements based on discussions with the design team.


**Qualifications**
* Prior experience as a Technical Designer within the games industry
* 4+ years of experience in collaboration and bridging between creatives and engineers.
* Experience in technical design processes, content creation, engines, tools and pipelines.
* Experience of the full cycle of AAA game development.
* Proficient in visual scripting-languages experience.
* Well versed in modern game design trends and how they function.
* Excellent in breaking down complex designs and systems into easy to understand bits for smoother collaborations.

title: Senior Javautvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 I denna roll kommer du huvudsakligen att vara ansvarig för utvecklingen utav ett centralt testramverk.Målet är att utveckla en produkt som innefattar och syr ihop allt som krävs för att genomföra gedigna end-to-end tester i en miljö med mycket höga krav på kvalitet och säkerhet. Produkten kommer även innefatta funktioner för monitorering.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* +10 års erfarenhet inom backend-utveckling
* +7 års erfarenhet inom Java-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av produktutveckling är ett krav
* Erfarenhet från bank & finans sektorn är ett plus
* Erfarenhet och av testintresse för QA är ett stort plus


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 27-12-2024
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Senior Software Architect - Native Apps
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 You will work with the native apps team within the larger product organization, to focus on developing and maintaining innovative and high performing mobile applications, keep us at the forefront of mobile gaming, and ultimately help us reach our passion of creating “The greatest iGaming experience”.
   

  

 The Native Apps Domain Architect is a senior architect role where you will be driving the native apps architectural strategy and ensuring it aligns with the business requirements. You will be a part of an architectural group and collaborate with other architects and senior developers in a cross collaborative environment. We do expect you to write code where needed to guide the developers in the team, and to ensure that our mobile applications meet business requirements, are performant and engaging for our customers.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Focus on the mobile apps for LeoVegas brands such as BetMGM, LeoVegas, BetUK and Expekt
* Contribute to launching new brands and brand expansions into new territories
* Long term vision of the mobile apps with a focus on product and user experience
* Ensuring that the mobile apps maintains an overall technical architecture that is robust, scalable and efficient
* Guide the development of high quality React native applications for both iOS and Android platforms
* We see that you have experience in leading other engineers and the ability to understand the overall picture. Communicating complex technical challenges for non-technical stakeholders.
* Represent your domain in technical discussions and solution designs with architect peers and stakeholders
* Educating developers in best practices and architecture principles
* Reviewing developers work and provide relevant feedback


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* Minimum of 4 years of working as an architect
* Minimum of 3 years of working as a mobile app developer
* Experience in mentoring other developers
* Good knowledge and understanding of iOS or android development
* Good understanding of architectural principles in scalable, highly concurrent, and fault-tolerant enterprise systems
* Clear Communication - being able to adapt depending on who you have in front of you


 NICE TO HAVES
   

  

* Experience with React Native
* Knowledge of GraphQL
* Experience with Typescript


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
